abstract: DealBook's love of finance-themed poetry is well-known. Josh Brown, who blogs as The Reformed Broker, has recently entered the fray with a poem about Groupon's impending public offering. It begins: "Gather round, dear investors, and hear all about / The worst I.P.O. that has ever come out."
